channel.title: Go on Hype-Driven Development
channel.description: Recent content in Go on Hype-Driven Development

item.title: When Should I Use Go?
item.description: DISCLAIMER: I don’t claim to be an expert on this language, so I may have made mistakes. If there is anything you would say differently or anything that is just plain wrong, please open an issue on Github Go is a language that many people (yet not enough) are talking about. Yes, it has the interesting origin of basically being designed by Google to solve Google’s problems. Yes, it looks at first glance like C with some random syntax changes.
